layman_description: A handheld firearm that shoots bullets one at a time.
technical_description: Ranged weapon with single-shot fire rate and standard caliber ammunition.
player_impact: Deal ranged damage to enemies with controlled accuracy.

layman_description: A powerful gun that spreads shots in a wide pattern.
technical_description: Ranged weapon with wide spread and high per-shot damage.
player_impact: High damage close range but ineffective at distance.

layman_description: A long-range rifle with high accuracy and damage.
technical_description: Precision ranged weapon with low rate-of-fire and high accuracy bonus.
player_impact: Best for long-distance sniping and pinpoint accuracy.

layman_description: A gun that shoots many bullets rapidly in succession.
technical_description: High-rate-of-fire automatic weapon with magazine-based ammo management.
player_impact: Outputs lots of bullets fast but uses ammunition quickly.

layman_description: A bow that shoots bolts with mechanical power and is silent.
technical_description: Ranged weapon with silent operation and bolt ammunition type.
player_impact: Quiet ranged weapon that doesn't alert distant zombies.

layman_description: A modern bow with mechanical advantage that shoots arrows far and fast.
technical_description: Ranged weapon with high draw power and arrow capacity.
player_impact: Effective ranged weapon that can be made without ammunition.

layman_description: A heavy pistol that packs more punch than regular pistols.
technical_description: High-power sidearm with revolver-cylinder magazine and strong per-shot damage.
player_impact: More powerful than standard pistol but slower fire rate.

layman_description: A shotgun with two barrels for devastating close-range firepower.
technical_description: Dual-fire ranged weapon with high damage per trigger pull.
player_impact: Extreme close-range damage but requires reload after two shots.

layman_description: A sharp blade for close melee combat and utility cutting.
technical_description: Melee weapon with bleed effect application and cutting interactions.
player_impact: Causes bleeding damage on hit and can cut materials.

layman_description: A metal blade that deals solid melee damage with each swing.
technical_description: Melee weapon with moderate damage per hit and durability value.
player_impact: Standard melee weapon for fighting at close range.
